content: Head through the archway, where you'll see another Flamling emerge on the right. Take the Flamling out and look down to the left, below the edge of the cliff where it sat.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Furnace_Valley_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Furnace Valley Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Valley Entrance' and the sub-subsection 'A Note on Flamlings'.
The content is as follows:
Head through the archway, where you'll see another Flamling emerge on the right. Take the Flamling out and look down to the left, below the edge of the cliff where it sat.
